system.description: Required for picking locks, these items are usable only by thieves. A typical set includes fine wire, various lockpicks, etc. Although the tools may be used many times if successful, they will break on failure. There are enough lockpicks and other components for 10 uses.
system.unidentifiedDesc: Required for picking locks, these items are usable only by thieves. A typical set includes fine wire, various lockpicks, etc. Although the tools may be used many times if successful, they will break on failure. There are enough lockpicks and other components for 10 uses.
